name: Get your transactional email activity aggregated over a period of time
fullName: Transactional/Statistics#Get your transactional email activity aggregated over a period of time
descriptionHtml: This endpoint will show the aggregated stats for past 90 days by default if `startDate` and `endDate` OR `days` is not passed. The date range can not exceed 90 days
statusMessage: Response status code is 200, Range field is present in the response, Request is 77 for the selected range
